item.title: ICE agents are vile, lying thugs. The only goal of ICE as a...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

ICE agents are vile, lying thugs. The only goal of ICE as a state agency is to harm people, instill terror, and wreck lives. The people who make up the ranks of ICE are enemies of humanity, and the long but inevitable arc of justice will judge them accordingly.

"A common tactic that accompanies this ruse is under public scrutiny once again. This time, in New York where a man who has been a resident of the city for over 30 years was apprehended in October 2020. Agents waited ...outside of his job as a chef in Harlem after his wife was confronted at their home. ICE agents identified themselves to her as police at the couples‚Äô apartment and showed her a photo of another man, not her husband. They led her to believe that there was an honest mix-up and if she helped them identify her husband, she would in effect be resolving the case of mistaken identity. After they received the identifying information that they needed from her which included his cell phone number, the agents arrested Fernando Santos-Rodriguez at the restaurant where he was arriving to begin his morning shift."

https://imm-print.com/ice-agents-step-up-deceptive-tactics‚Ä¶/

See MoreBeware: ICE endorses the practice of their agents falsely posing as police officers in order to gain access to homes, spread confusion and apprehend immigrants.

imm-print.com

ICE Agents Step Up Deceptive Tactics To Detain Immigrants

Beware: ICE endorses the practice of their agents falsely posing as police officers in order to gain access to homes, spread confusion and apprehend immigrants.Beware: ICE endorses the practice of their agents falsely posing as police officers in order to gain access to homes, spread confusion and apprehend immigrants.

item.title: ‚Äú‚ÄòI want to leave because when I get mad they give me...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

‚Äú‚ÄòI want to leave because when I get mad they give me shots,‚Äô said the boy, whose name is redacted in the public court filings. ‚ÄòI think the last time was about a month ago. When they give me a shot, it makes me feel sad. And then I will sleep for a day. When I wake up after, I feel desperate. My body feels desperate.‚Äô

In the last months of the Trump administration, other immigrant youth in government custody have been drugged and isolated for long periods, according to court records. The documents describe children languishing for months, including a young ‚Äònonverbal‚Äô girl who was separated from her father at the border over a year ago and is now unable to directly communicate with her family in Guatemala.‚Äù

"When I get mad they give me shots."

vice.com

Immigrant Teens Say They're Being Forcibly Drugged in US Custody

"When I get mad they give me shots.""When I get mad they give me shots."

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverShontel LewisI honestly don‚Äôt see the difference here. This is betrayal. It is no coincidence that the disproportionate...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverShontel Lewis

I honestly don‚Äôt see the difference here. This is betrayal.

It is no coincidence that the disproportionate demographic make up of these two systems are Black, Brown and Indigenous. Our siblings.

Are we not outraged if the hypocrisy? Are we not outraged of the betrayal?

item.title: Fuck Councilwoman Bergan!
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Fuck Councilwoman Bergan!

Candice Bailey

My friend posted this and I am livid:
Aurora liberals' two most favorite white ladies to make excuses for just voted to elevate Francoise "Thin Blue Line Wearin...g, They're Not Concentration Camps, Republican Ass Republican" Bergan to the Mayor Pro Tem seat rather than stand in solidarity behind the Brown Emerge sister and LIFELONG ORIGINAL AURORA RESIDENT they came into office with in 2017.

That's it. Chopped. Done. I've spent twelve months telling people what it is. If you still support these two after today, you are beyond complicit. I don't care what our history is: unfriend me, or I'll do it for you. We're done.

Can't say I detect a lie! Christopher Savin and I have been screaming for a year. We watched Johnston slaughter Crystal Murillo publicly, with NO REMORSE. This is not an advancement for the people of Aurora. Can't say we weren't warning everyone.
Absolutely DISRESPECTFUL to the residents of this city.

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverParty for Socialism and Liberation - DenverIt‚Äôs almost 1, and the Aurora Civil Service Commission meeting is beginning...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverParty for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

It‚Äôs almost 1, and the Aurora Civil Service Commission meeting is beginning soon. Get ready to call in!

Beginning next week, the Commission will begin private ...hearings to decide whether to overturn the firing of APD officers Erica Marrero, Kyle Dittrich, and Jason Rosenblatt.

Marrero and Dittrich, pictured left, took photos mocking Elijah McClain‚Äôs death at his memorial site and sent them to the cops who tortured and killed Elijah, Nathan Woodyard and Jason Rosenblatt.

Rosenblatt wrote back ‚Äúhaha‚Äù and was caught. He was fired for this incident and remains the only one of Elijah‚Äôs killers who lost his job.

These cops have demonstrated that they have absolutely no business patrolling our streets, armed, with the ability to decide if people like Elijah live or die. We demand that they are NOT reinstated!

Tune in to our stories for live updates during the meeting!

#justiceforelijahmcclain

item.title: "The Wall Street Journal first reported in February that...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

"The Wall Street Journal first reported in February that the Trump administration was buying access to such data through a company named Venntel that was selling access to a database to DHS, ICE and CBP.

‚ÄúThe agencies‚Äô purchase raise serious concerns that they are avoiding Fourth Amendment protection for cell phone location information by paying for access instead of obtaining a warrant,‚Äù the ACLU wrote in the lawsuit.

In 2018, the Supreme Court held in Carpenter vs. Unite...d States that collecting significant quantities of historical data location from cellphones is a search under the Fourth Amendment and requires a warrant [...]

The ACLU said in the suit the records ‚Äúwould contribute significantly to the public‚Äôs understanding‚Äù of how the agencies use ‚Äúinvasive surveillance technology both at the border and within American communities, and whether they are complying with constitutional and legal limitations on unreasonable searches.‚Äù

See MoreThe American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) is ramping up efforts to obtain records of the Trump administration‚Äôs reported purchase of cellphone data to track locations

thehill.com

ACLU sues DHS for records on purchased cell phone data to track immigrants

The American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) is ramping up efforts to obtain records of the Trump administration‚Äôs reported purchase of cellphone data to track locationsThe American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) is ramping up efforts to obtain records of the Trump administration‚Äôs reported purchase of cellphone data to track locations

item.title: ICE investigators issued a subpoena this week demanding BuzzFeed...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

ICE investigators issued a subpoena this week demanding BuzzFeed News identify its sources ‚Äî an extraordinary attempt by the government to interfere with a news outlet acting under the protections of the First Amendment.

"This is embarrassing for ICE. I think it is a weak effort to intimidate the press,‚Äù said John Sandweg, former acting director of the agency. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line. It is something that the agency should never do.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is embarrassing for ICE,‚Äù the former acting director of the agency said. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line.‚Äù

buzzfeednews.com

ICE Is Trying To Force BuzzFeed News To Divulge Its Sources

‚ÄúThis is embarrassing for ICE,‚Äù the former acting director of the agency said. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line.‚Äù‚ÄúThis is embarrassing for ICE,‚Äù the former acting director of the agency said. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line.‚Äù
